verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH1961> a long<WH7227> time<WH4480> <WH3117> after<WH310> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had given rest<WH5117> unto Israel<WH3478> from all<WH4480> <WH3605> their enemies<WH341> round about,<WH4480> <WH5439> that Joshua<WH3091> waxed old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age.<WH3117>

And Joshua<WH3091> called<WH7121> for all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> and for their elders,<WH2205> and for their heads,<WH7218> and for their judges,<WH8199> and for their officers,<WH7860> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I<WH589> am old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in age: <WH3117>

And ye<WH859> have seen<WH7200> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath done<WH6213> unto all<WH3605> these<WH428> nations<WH1471> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of you; for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> is he<WH1931> that hath fought<WH3898> for you.

Behold, <WH7200> I have divided unto you by lot<WH5307> <WH853> these<WH428> nations<WH1471> that remain,<WH7604> to be an inheritance<WH5159> for your tribes,<WH7626> from<WH4480> Jordan,<WH3383> with all<WH3605> the nations<WH1471> that<WH834> I have cut off,<WH3772> even unto the great<WH1419> sea<WH3220> westward.<WH3996> <WH8121>

And the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he<WH1931> shall expel<WH1920> them from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, and drive<WH3423> them from out of your sight;<WH4480> <WH6440> and ye shall possess<WH3423> <WH853> their land,<WH776> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath promised<WH1696> unto you.

Be ye therefore very<WH3966> courageous<WH2388> to keep<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> that is written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the law<WH8451> of Moses,<WH4872> that ye turn<WH5493> not<WH1115> aside<WH5493> therefrom<WH4480> to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left;<WH8040>

That ye come<WH935> not<WH1115> among these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> these<WH428> that remain<WH7604> among you; neither<WH3808> make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of their gods,<WH430> nor<WH3808> cause to swear<WH7650> by them, neither<WH3808> serve<WH5647> them, nor<WH3808> bow yourselves<WH7812> unto them:
But <WH3588> <WH518> cleave<WH1692> unto the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> as<WH834> ye have done<WH6213> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

For the LORD<WH3068> hath driven out<WH3423> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you great<WH1419> nations<WH1471> and strong:<WH6099> but as for you,<WH859> no<WH3808> man<WH376> hath been able to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

One <WH259> man<WH376> of<WH4480> you shall chase<WH7291> a thousand:<WH505> for<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he<WH1931> it is that fighteth<WH3898> for you, as<WH834> he hath promised<WH1696> you.
Take good<WH3966> heed<WH8104> therefore unto yourselves,<WH5315> that ye love<WH157> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

Else <WH3588> if<WH518> ye do in any wise go back,<WH7725> <WH7725> and cleave<WH1692> unto the remnant<WH3499> of these<WH428> nations,<WH1471> even these<WH428> that remain<WH7604> among<WH854> you, and shall make marriages<WH2859> with them, and go in<WH935> unto them, and they<WH1992> to you:

Know for a certainty<WH3045> <WH3045> that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> will no<WH3808> more<WH3254> drive out<WH3423> any of<WH853> these<WH428> nations<WH1471> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you; but they shall be<WH1961> snares<WH6341> and traps<WH4170> unto you, and scourges<WH7850> in your sides,<WH6654> and thorns<WH6976> in your eyes,<WH5869> until<WH5704> ye perish<WH6> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> this<WH2063> good<WH2896> land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> you.

And, behold,<WH2009> this day<WH3117> I<WH595> am going<WH1980> the way<WH1870> of all<WH3605> the earth:<WH776> and ye know<WH3045> in all<WH3605> your hearts<WH3824> and in all<WH3605> your souls,<WH5315> that<WH3588> not<WH3808> one<WH259> thing<WH1697> hath failed<WH5307> of all<WH4480> <WH3605> the good<WH2896> things<WH1697> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> concerning<WH5921> you; all<WH3605> are come to pass<WH935> unto you, and not<WH3808> one<WH259> thing<WH1697> hath failed<WH5307> thereof.<WH4480>

Therefore it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that as<WH834> all<WH3605> good<WH2896> things<WH1697> are come<WH935> upon<WH5921> you, which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> promised<WH1696> <WH413> you; so<WH3651> shall the LORD<WH3068> bring<WH935> upon<WH5921> you<WH853> all<WH3605> evil<WH7451> things,<WH1697> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH8045> you from off<WH4480> <WH5921> this<WH2063> good<WH2896> land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> you.

When ye have transgressed<WH5674> <WH853> the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> you, and have gone<WH1980> and served<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and bowed yourselves<WH7812> to them; then shall the anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you, and ye shall perish<WH6> quickly<WH4120> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> he hath given<WH5414> unto you.
